definition: clover native to Ireland with yellowish flowers
details:
noun
- clover native to Ireland with yellowish flowers
= example: clover native to Ireland with yellowish flowers
= synonyms: hop clover
- creeping European clover having white to pink flowers and bright green leaves
= synonyms: white clover, dutch clover
- Eurasian plant with heart-shaped trifoliate leaves and white purple-veined flowers
= synonyms: common wood sorrel, cuckoo bread
